column1: Hope the rumors of Schlumberger buying Franks are true.
Yup. But be careful. Had a ton of volume come in today. About 2 Mil worth. Large block trade! If we hold $2.40, we’ll be in for a nice rally.

So, I'm just finding out about this Merger, yeah, I know....I am way late to the party. I hold 1900 shares of FI, avg in at about $10...so stand to lose 19k?? The investigation makes it sound like Franks shares will not be dissolved??? Will there still be Franks shares after the merger? I'm I ok? DO I hold? Does anyone know what the hell is going on??
